Body:
other_file = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), os.pardir, 'data',
    'example_fort.5')
xyz = Xyz(file_name)
xyz.read_file(silent=True)
assert xyz.x.shape == (12, 25)
del xyz
xyz = Xyz(other_file)
caught = False
try:
    xyz.read_file(silent=True)
except ValueError:
    caught = True
assert caught
del xyz
xyz = Xyz(other_file)
xyz.read_file(file_name, silent=True)
assert xyz.y.shape == (12, 25)
